key.kyrptconfig.config.nothastags: This field does not supports tags
key.kyrptconfig.config.tagsdisplay: Note: Tags will only display properly in-game
key.kyrptconfig.exampleconfig.middleclic: Middle click slot to sort inventory
key.kyrptconfig.exampleconfig.doubleclic: Double click slot to sort inventory
key.kyrptconfig.exampleconfig.seperatebt: Always display button for player inv
key.kyrptconfig.exampleconfig.debugtoolt:
The tooltip when hovering over a sort button 
will list instruction to blacklist that inv
key.kyrptconfig.exampleconfig.hidetoolti:
Neither the opened inventory, nor your player inventory 
will be sortable when this inventory is opened
key.kyrptconfig.exampleconfig.nosorttool:
The opened inventory's sort button will not be visible, 
only the player's when this inventory is opened
